comment.author: 42400804@N05
comment._content: I had to look at this in its original size - it's so interesting.  I especially like the two boys stealing ahead of the bride and groom!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/42400804@N05] Thanks for your response, there are actually a number of similar images on our eMuseum site if you are interested. I tried a search using the terms 'William Hall bride' and returned several interesting pics! see: bit.ly/HYQMZd
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
